Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    Model module generates the game board
    Author:
    Bolin Chen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Model()
      default constructor, generate 3 X 3 char[][] board and an Arraylist of all available moves
